test_strategy_covers_unit_integration_e2.notes: Strategy covers: unit tests (61 tests, file content validation), integration tests (17 tests, cross-module consistency and pattern compliance), edge case tests (10 tests, boundary conditions and negative tests). Security N/A (no runtime code). Performance N/A (debate loop convergence is orchestrator logic, not new code).

traceability_matrix_complete.notes: 99 rows in test-traceability-matrix.csv mapping all ACs to test cases. 0 orphan tests. All 34 VR rules covered.

coverage_targets_defined.notes: 100% AC coverage, 100% VR rule coverage, 85+ test cases target (achieved 88), 3-level pyramid, 0 regressions

article_ii_test_first.notes: All 88 tests designed before implementation (Phase 05 before Phase 06). Test file designed for RED phase validation.

article_vii_traceability.notes: 100% requirement coverage: all 36 ACs mapped to test cases. 0 orphan tests. All 34 VR rules from validation-rules.json mapped.
